titles.title: A bill to grant the consent of the Congress to the Kansas and Missouri Metropolitan Culture District Compact.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 619.

bill.summary: 8/18/1994--Introduced. Interstate Compact - Grants the consent of the Congress to the Kansas and Missouri Metropolitan Culture District Compact entered into between the States of Kansas and Missouri.
